Package optimizer

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • optimizer.Node
  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    represents a node in the network

    • Constructor Detail

      • Node

        public Node​(double elevation,
            double demand,
            int nodeID,
            double minPressure,
            java.lang.String nodeName,
            double peakFactor,
            java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> usedNodeIDs)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs a new Node object with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        elevation - The elevation of the node.
        demand - The base demand of the node.
        nodeID - The custom node ID to set.
        minPressure - The minimum pressure at the node.
        nodeName - The name of the node.
        peakFactor - The peak factor for demand calculation.
        usedNodeIDs - A set of used node IDs to check for uniqueness.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the node ID is invalid or already being used.
